checkboxes.title: Gateway (all-in-one)
checkboxes.description: Gateway devices are all-in-one, complete with an enclosure, ready to be deployed in your project for both prototyping and production.

checkboxes.title: Development kit
checkboxes.description: Developer kits are designed for experimentation, hobbyists, and prototyping.

checkboxes.title: Module
checkboxes.description: Production modules are designed for mass production. In many cases you will need to create your own circuit board to utilize the module.

checkboxes.title: Cellular
checkboxes.description: Cellular is a popular option for products because it doesn't depend on your customer's Wi-Fi.

checkboxes.title: Wi-Fi
checkboxes.description: This is the least expensive option, and works globally.

checkboxes.title: Ethernet
checkboxes.description: This option is ideal for some industrial applications where there may not be cellular or Wi-Fi available.

checkboxes.title: Satellite (NTN)
checkboxes.description: This option is helpful for low-data remote sensing applications, or as an emergency backup tp cellular.

checkboxes.title: LoRaWAN
checkboxes.description: This option is helpful for low-data remote sensing applications in some locations with poor cellular connectivity.

radio.title: Medium
radio.description: Some local data analysis. Small machine learning models or classifiers.

radio.title: High
radio.description: Large machine learning models, video or sound processing
